titleStmt.title: The strange discovery a tragi-comedy. Written by I.G. Gent.
titleStmt.author: J. G. (John Gough), fl. 1640.
Heliodorus, of Emesa.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for William Leake, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane, joyning to the Roles,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with "I. Gough" on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
